<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mirror Goggles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2315)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 147 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These goggles feature highly reflective lenses. While wearing the goggles, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks and to saving throws against [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) effects.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))  **Trigger** A creature within 60 feet targets you with a visual effect;  **Effect** You turn your head to reflect aspects of the triggering effect back at its creator. The creature must attempt a DC 20 Fortitude save as it becomes disoriented by this reflection. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure). The creature is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
